channel.title: Walks,after 1 square, stops for a second, then walks again?
channel.description: used the search bar, didn't find anything. basically my guy restarts the walk animation after every square. It doesn't always do it but something is causing this to happen, please help?

item.title: Walks,after 1 square, stops for a second, then walks again?
item.dc:creator: @Thecheeseman11 Thecheeseman11
item.description:
@Thecheeseman11 wrote:

I garentee you its not lag. It has to do with something of after fighting and following it, its called like Attack-Follow I think. All I know is that it does it when you attack an npc or something, and the npc moves a little and you follow it and attack again, then you’ll walk or run funny like that. Garentee its not lag :S

Read full topic
